mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MMS_MSG (MSGKEY, SUBJECT, PHONE, CALLBACK, STATUS, REQDATE, MSG, TYPE, FILE_CNT, FILE_PATH1) VALUES ( MMS_MSG_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{callback,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '0', SYSDATE, #{msg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '0', '1', #{filePath1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
